name: Whitelist
description: Allow access based on internal and external IP/network/rDNS/ASN whitelists.

WHITELIST_IP.help: List of IP/network, separated with spaces, to put into the whitelist.
WHITELIST_IP.label: Whitelist IP/network

WHITELIST_RDNS.help: List of reverse DNS suffixes, separated with spaces, to whitelist.
WHITELIST_RDNS.label: Whitelist reverse DNS

WHITELIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.help: Only perform RDNS whitelist checks on global IP addresses.
WHITELIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.label: Whitelist reverse DNS global IPs

WHITELIST_ASN.help: List of ASN numbers, separated with spaces, to whitelist.
WHITELIST_ASN.label: Whitelist ASN

WHITELIST_USER_AGENT.help: List of User-Agent (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to whitelist.
WHITELIST_USER_AGENT.label: Whitelist User-Agent

WHITELIST_URI.help: List of URI (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to whitelist.
WHITELIST_URI.label: Whitelist URI

WHITELIST_IP_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing good IP/network to whitelist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
WHITELIST_IP_URLS.label: Whitelist IP/network URLs

WHITELIST_RDNS_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing reverse DNS suffixes to whitelist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
WHITELIST_RDNS_URLS.label: Whitelist reverse DNS URLs

WHITELIST_ASN_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing ASN to whitelist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
WHITELIST_ASN_URLS.label: Whitelist ASN URLs

WHITELIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing good User-Agent to whitelist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
WHITELIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.label: Whitelist User-Agent URLs

WHITELIST_URI_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing bad URI to whitelist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
WHITELIST_URI_URLS.label: Whitelist URI URLs
